snippet.title: Forager Devlog #1 - NEW CONTENT! (Open world, Combat, NPCs, Quests & more!)
snippet.description:
Forager is being developed by HopFrog (and our amazingly creative community) and published by Humble Bundle!


Please subscribe to our mailing list so you don't miss out on updates & test builds!  https://goo.gl/QAD6Jq


PLAY THE FREE DEMO! 
https://goo.gl/fCTu9d


READ THE BLOG POST FOR THIS UPDATE!
https://goo.gl/joEBtJ


Contents of this devlog:

00:32- Open World
02:25 - Combat Mechanics
03:29 - NPCs & Characters
03:58 - Redesigned Menu System
04:40 - General Improvements



FOLLOW DEVELOPMENT AND SUGGEST IDEAS!

On Twitter: https://goo.gl/voHvnu
Our Blog: https://goo.gl/yG8T1i
Our Forums: https://goo.gl/XLSWZJ

You may personally get in touch with me at mariano@hopfrogsa.com

The concept art in this video was made by Gaziter (https://goo.gl/Na5Y2u) & Buch (https://goo.gl/h6y6rQ). The music was made by Hernan Marandino (https://goo.gl/MUeEER). Voice over provided by Katrina Hale-Philips.
